channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Uncertainty over federal food aid grows as the shutdown fight reaches a crisis point
item.description: The twin crises at the heart of the government shutdown fight in Washington are coming to a head. The federal food assistance program is facing delays and uncertainty.

item.title: Ohio panel and Virginia lawmakers move forward with congressional redistricting plans
SNAP benefits cut off during shutdown, driving long lines at food pantries
